about_the_game:
The playlist of champions!

The Official Bloons TD Battles 2 Soundtrack, composed by Tim Haywood.

Bop along to the catchy Red Bloon Salsa, get the blood pumping during your workout with Let Them Eat Lead, or lift your mood after a hard day with Just Another ZOMG. These beats sound great with or without the pop-pop-pop of your Dartling Gunner cleaning up an opponent's failed rush.

All 13 tracks from the game are included, plus a special dance remix of the main theme. Every one of them has been specially mixed for a complete listening experience.
Any new tracks added in future game updates will be made available to you, at no additional cost.
Provided in FLAC and MP3 format.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 72 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 280 MB available space

short_description: The Official Bloons TD Battles 2 Soundtrack, composed by Tim Haywood. 14 totally awesome tracks to bop along to any time of the day - perfect listening whether you're chasing trophies or just feeling casual.
